feed.title: Google Cloud: Sensitive Data Protection
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Sensitive Data Protection

entry.content: The OBJECT_TYPE/PERSON/FACE infoType detector is available in Preview in global and the asia, europe, and us multi-regions. For more information about all infoTypes, see InfoType detector reference.
entry.summary: The OBJECT_TYPE/PERSON/FACE infoType detector is now in Preview across multiple regions. This feature enhances sensitive data protection by identifying personal faces within your data. Explore the InfoType detector reference for a comprehensive list of supported sensitive data types.
entry.title: Feature: New Person Face Detection InfoType

entry.content: The KOREA_NHI_NUMBER infoType detector is available in all regions. For more information about all built-in infoTypes, see the InfoType detector reference.
entry.summary: The KOREA_NHI_NUMBER infoType detector is now available in all regions, expanding its reach for sensitive data detection.
entry.title: Feature: KOREA_NHI_NUMBER detector now available in all regions

entry.content:
The following infoType detectors are available in global and the europe and us multi-regions:

  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/CONTEXT/FINANCE
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/CONTEXT/HEALTH
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/CONTEXT/LEGAL
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/CONTEXT/OBSCENE
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/CONTEXT/OFFENSIVE
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/CONTEXT/POLITICS
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/CONTEXT/RELIGION
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/CONTEXT/SEXUAL

For more information about all infoTypes, see InfoType detector reference.
entry.summary: Explore new finance, health, and legal infoType detectors, among others, now accessible in global and multi-regions.
entry.title: Feature: New infoType detectors now available

entry.content: The OBJECT_TYPE/PERSON/PASSPORT and OBJECT_TYPE/PERSON/PHOTO_ID_CARD infoType detectors are available in global and the asia, europe, and us multi-regions. For more information about all infoTypes, see InfoType detector reference.
entry.summary: New detectors for identifying passport and photo ID card information are now available in global, asia, europe, and us multi-regions.
entry.title: Feature: New detectors for IDs and passports

entry.content: The NEW_ZEALAND_DRIVERS_LICENSE_NUMBER infoType detector is available in all regions. For more information about all built-in infoTypes, see the InfoType detector reference.
entry.summary: The New Zealand Drivers License Number detector is now available in all regions.
entry.title: Feature: New detector available

entry.content: Customers with an organization-level activation of Security Command Center Premium have an organization-level discovery subscription at no charge from Sensitive Data Protection. For more information, see Sensitive data discovery in Security Command Center Premium.
entry.summary: Get a free Sensitive Data Protection discovery subscription with Security Command Center Premium.
entry.title: Feature: Security Command Center Premium

entry.content: The BRAZIL_RG_NUMBER infoType detector is available in all regions. For more information about all built-in infoTypes, see the InfoType detector reference.
entry.summary: The `BRAZIL_RG_NUMBER` infoType detector is now available for use in all regions, enhancing data protection capabilities across diverse geographical locations.
entry.title: Feature: BRAZIL_RG_NUMBER detector now available in all regions

entry.content:
This is an addition to the May 1 release note announcing the deprecation of the ability to send inspection and discovery results from Sensitive Data Protection to Data Catalog.

If you have workflows that create inspection jobs or job triggers and set the deprecated PublishFindingsToCloudDataCatalog action, you must update those workflows by January 30, 2026. On or after this date, new jobs and job triggers that are created by those workflows will fail.
entry.summary: The ability to send inspection and discovery results from Sensitive Data Protection to Data Catalog is being deprecated. Update workflows using the 'PublishFindingsToCloudDataCatalog' action by January 30, 2026, to avoid job failures.
entry.title: Breaking: Sensitive Data Protection: Data Catalog Integration Deprecation

entry.content: The DOCUMENT_TYPE/FINANCE/INVOICE and DOCUMENT_TYPE/MEDICAL/RECORD infoType detectors are available in global and the asia, europe, and us multi-regions. For more information about all infoTypes, see InfoType detector reference.
entry.summary: The DOCUMENT_TYPE/FINANCE/INVOICE and DOCUMENT_TYPE/MEDICAL/RECORD infoType detectors are now available in global and multi-regions. Check the InfoType detector reference for more details.
entry.title: Feature: New infoType detectors for finance and medical records

entry.content: When you inspect a BigQuery table for sensitive data, you can send the inspection findings to Dataplex Universal Catalog. For more information, see Send inspection results to Dataplex Universal Catalog as aspects.
entry.summary: Inspect BigQuery tables for sensitive data and send findings to Dataplex Universal Catalog.
entry.title: Feature: Dataplex Catalog Integration

entry.content: Fixed the issue preventing Sensitive Data Protection from detecting sensitive data in the headers and footers of certain rich document types.
entry.summary: An issue that prevented Sensitive Data Protection from detecting sensitive data in the headers and footers of certain rich document types has been resolved.
entry.title: Fixed: Sensitive Data Protection: Issue Fixed

entry.content: When configuring schedules for Cloud Storage data discovery, you can select data based on specific tags. For more information, see Profile Cloud Storage data in an organization or folder or Profile Cloud Storage data in a single project.
entry.summary: You can now select specific tags when configuring schedules for Cloud Storage data discovery.
entry.title: Feature: New: Filter data discovery by tag

entry.content: The August 25 release note announcing the release of the DOCUMENT_TYPE/FINANCE/INVOICE and DOCUMENT_TYPE/MEDICAL/RECORD infoType detectors was published in error. These infotypes are not available.
entry.summary: The recently published release note about the `DOCUMENT_TYPE/FINANCE/INVOICE` and `DOCUMENT_TYPE/MEDICAL/RECORD` infoType detectors was published in error. These detectors are not yet available.
entry.title: Announcement: InfoType detectors released in error

entry.content: The DOCUMENT_TYPE/FINANCE/INVOICE and DOCUMENT_TYPE/MEDICAL/RECORD infoType detectors are available in global and the asia, europe, and us multi-regions. For more information about all infoTypes, see InfoType detector reference.
entry.summary: The DOCUMENT_TYPE/FINANCE/INVOICE and DOCUMENT_TYPE/MEDICAL/RECORD infoType detectors are now available in global and the asia, europe, and us multi-regions.
entry.title: Feature: New infoType detectors available

entry.content: The AUSTRIA_SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER infoType detector is available in all regions. For more information about all built-in infoTypes, see the InfoType detector reference.
entry.summary: The AUSTRIA_SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER infoType detector is now available in all regions.
entry.title: Feature: New detector available

entry.content: During discovery operations, Sensitive Data Protection scans the contents of various archive files. For a list of supported file types, see Supported file clusters in discovery operations.
entry.summary: This feature scans archive files.
entry.title: Feature: Archive Scanning

entry.content: You can configure Sensitive Data Protection to save the findings from an inspection job to a Cloud Storage bucket or folder. For more information, see Save findings to Cloud Storage.
entry.summary: This feature allows users to save sensitive data inspection findings to a Cloud Storage bucket or folder.
entry.title: Feature: Save Inspection Findings to Cloud Storage

entry.content:
Sensitive Data Protection provides recommendations to optimize your infoType selections. In the Google Cloud console, if you select a specific infoType that is covered by a general infoType, Sensitive Data Protection recommends general infoTypes that you can use instead.

For information about the benefits of using general infoTypes, see General and specific infoType detectors.
entry.summary: Optimize your infoType selections with Sensitive Data Protection.
entry.title: Feature: InfoType Recommendations

entry.content:
The following infoType detectors are available in all regions. For more information about all built-in infoTypes, see InfoType detector reference.

  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/C
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/CPP
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/CS
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/GO
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/HTML
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/JAVA
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/JAVASCRIPT
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/JSON
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/PHP
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/POWERSHELL
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/PYTHON
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/RUST
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/SHELL
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/SQL
  • DOCUMENT_TYPE/R&D/SOURCE_CODE/TYPESCRIPT
entry.summary: Discover the expanded list of supported code languages for sensitive data detection.
entry.title: Feature: New Languages Supported

entry.content:
Sensitive Data Protection can detect and redact the following object infoTypes in images:

  • OBJECT_TYPE/BARCODE
  • OBJECT_TYPE/LICENSE_PLATE
  • OBJECT_TYPE/PERSON
  • OBJECT_TYPE/WHITEBOARD

For more information, see the following:

  • Inspect an image for sensitive objects
  • Object redaction
entry.summary: Sensitive Data Protection now supports detecting and redacting sensitive content in images, including barcodes, license plates, people, and whiteboards.
entry.title: Feature: Sensitive data detection in images

entry.content: The CZECHIA_PERSONAL_ID_NUMBER infoType detector is available in all regions. For more information about all built-in infoTypes, see InfoType detector reference.
entry.summary: The CZECHIA_PERSONAL_ID_NUMBER infoType detector is now available in all regions, enhancing data protection capabilities.
entry.title: Feature: New infoType detector available
